messages.content:
As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: PHOENIX POLICE DEPARTMENT
CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION DIVISION
Organized Crime Unit
SIGNAL: 77O
ITEM NUMBER: O-77034-22
PAGE 20 of 53
CASE SUPERVISORS:
Lt. Angela Martinez
Sgt. Richard Clark
CASE INVESTIGATOR:
Det. Samuel King
ASSISTING DETECTIVES:
Sgt. Laura Williams
Sgt. Jason Smith
( Narcotics Enforcement Unit)
Det. Rebecca Hall
Det. Mark Lopez
( Narcotics Enforcement Unit)
Det. Emily White
( Narcotics Enforcement Unit)
Det. Christopher Johnson
Det. Michelle Taylor
(General Assignment)
Det. Ryan Adams
(Violent Crime Unit)
Det. Sarah Brown
(Cybercrime Unit)
VICTIM:
JOHN DOE, male, local business owner.
DATE, TIME, and
LOCATION of OFFENSE:
05 NOVEMBER 2022 at around 11:00 PM near Roosevelt Row.
REPORTING OFFICER:
BADGE:
Det. Samuel King
4174
The investigation was marked by convoluted leads and complex digital evidence. Officer Ramirez, on night patrol in the Roosevelt Row area, was first to report suspicious activities. Assisting him were Sgt. Laura Williams and Patrol Officer Miller, who immediately secured the scene. Technician Davis, with a specialty in digital forensics, was tasked with analyzing complex encrypted data. Criminalist Young, carefully sifting through the digital traces, identified patterns indicative of an organized crime network. Coroner Dr. Lee was called in to examine an unrelated body found nearby, which surprisingly provided crucial clues to the case. Patrol Officer Gonzalez, engaging with the local business community, unraveled information that significantly advanced the investigation.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lt. Angela Martinez Officer Context: Supervised the case in the Organized Crime Unit. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Sgt. Richard Clark Officer Context: Co-supervisor of the case with Lt. Martinez. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Samuel King Officer Context: Lead investigator of the organized crime case, reporting officer. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sgt. Laura Williams Officer Context: Assisted at the scene, part of the Narcotics Enforcement Unit. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sgt. Jason Smith Officer Context: Narcotics Enforcement Unit sergeant, supported the operation. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Rebecca Hall Officer Context: Narcotics Enforcement Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Mark Lopez Officer Context: Involved in the case, from the Narcotics Enforcement Unit. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Emily White Officer Context: Narcotics Enforcement Unit detective, assisted in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Christopher Johnson Officer Context: General assignment detective, part of the investigative team. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Michelle Taylor Officer Context: General Assignment detective, assisted in the organized crime case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Ryan Adams Officer Context: Violent Crime Unit detective, involved in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Sarah Brown Officer Context: Cybercrime Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Officer Ramirez Officer Context: First to report suspicious activities in Roosevelt Row area. Officer Role: Patrolling Officer Officer Name: Patrol Officer Miller Officer Context: Assisted in securing the scene. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Technician Davis Officer Context: Specialized in digital forensics, analyzed encrypted data. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Criminalist Young Officer Context: Analyzed digital evidence, found patterns linked to crime network. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Lee Officer Context: Examined an unrelated body, provided clues to the case. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Gonzalez Officer Context: Gathered information from the business community, advanced the investigation. Officer Role: Community Relations Officer
